exceptions.tactic: intros f a b lf M H1 H2.

exceptions.exn: The reference b was not found in the current environment.
The reference M was not found in the current environment.
The reference H1 was not found in the current environment.
Unable to find an instance for the variables plus, opp, zero.
The reference lra was not found in the current environment.

original: intros f a b lf M H1 H2. destruct (Rle_dec a b) as [Hab|Hba]. - apply norm_RInt_le_const with (M:=M); auto. intros x Hx. apply H1. split; apply Hx. - assert (Hless: b <= a) by lra. clear Hba.
